page.title: 17Lifestyle
page.content: Life styles are much changed recently. Tenant farms with tied cottages were rented from 4 estates on which the owners lived & employed estate workers. Break up of estates began about 20 yrs ago. Little new building is allowed by planners so value of old houses is high & are now modernised by retired people & commuters. Occupations include Merchant Banker, Accountant, Solicitor, Barristers, Librarian, Civil Servant, local businessmen, Builder, Journalists, Dental Surgeon. These contrast with long standing residents recently employed on estates. Local work includes farming, forestry. Two inns & some farms do bed & breakfast for tourists. There are no shops in the area.
